function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of infectious agents","Impact":"Long-lasting presence of infectious droplet nuclei in the air, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, wearing masks, and maintaining proper humidity levels","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, HEPA filters, UV-C light sterilization, HVAC systems with increased air exchange rates","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, healthcare workers, individuals in crowded environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
